sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack with Smart is to hit as hard as possible 
 192 Speed with Nimble outspeeds Very Smart Shawchi and below 
 20 Energy = 250 Energy at level 50 for (4 Frost Beams + 2 Peace of Minds) 
 88 HP makes Health Amulet restore 10 points of Health per turn
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 200 HP, 20 En, 56 M Def, 200 R Atk, 24 Sp / 0 En, 76 M Def
sets.detail: 200 HP, 200 Ranged Defense and Very Clever is to be as Ranged bulky as possible, 56 / 76 Melee Defense is leftovers and increases overall bulk, 24 Speed outspeeds Sluggish Stratusoar, 0 Energy = 246 Energy at level 50 for (4 Stratagems + 2 Peace of Minds) with Heavy Shield, 20 Energy = 250 Energy at level 50 for (5 Stratagems + 2 Peace of Minds) with Health Amulet
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
